S

selectInsurance() - Method in class healthABM.Patient
Patient selects the HIPlan with the least cost (only when Patient satisfies plan requirements and has enough money to pay for it)
selectProvider(Illness) - Method in class healthABM.Patient
In this method, patient select an specialist checking who will cost him the least (considering the cost of a visit and the current HI status of patient)
selectTreatment(Illness, boolean) - Method in class healthABM.Provider
 
SES - Variable in class healthABM.Patient
Socioeconomic status as a boolean value (false:low ; true:high)
setInsurance(HealthInsurance) - Method in class healthABM.Patient
Adds the HealthInsurance in the argument to the list of insurances of the company.
severity - Variable in class healthABM.MedicalCondition
Amount by which this medical condition is affecting the patient's health status
socialNetwork - Variable in class healthABM.Patient
Array list with all the other individuals in the social network
space - Variable in class healthABM.Provider
 
specialization - Variable in class healthABM.Provider
Indicates the type of illness for which the Provider has an specialization (null for general practitioners)
startContract - Variable in class healthABM.HealthInsurance
Tick when this contract was first introduced (might be useful to compute the number of years
stepContractInsurance() - Method in class healthABM.Patient
 
stepGetMedicalCare() - Method in class healthABM.Patient
 
stepGetSick() - Method in class healthABM.Patient
This method determines if this Patient contracts any of the existing Illnesses in the model for every tick.
stepModel() - Method in class healthABM.Model
This method prints the current tick in the model and resets (to 0) the incidence rates for the current tick
stepPatient() - Method in class healthABM.Patient
 
stepProvider() - Method in class healthABM.Provider
 
stopclaim - Variable in class healthABM.HIPlan
Amount of reimbursement after which the client is no longer entitled to receive reimbursement.
stoploss - Variable in class healthABM.HIPlan
Amount after which the patient has no more co-payment.
